eu.tivian.musico.net

Class Spotify

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.musico.net.Service
      • eu.tivian.musico.net.Spotify

  • public class Spotify
extends Service
    Provides information about artists and albums. Currently used only for artist icons and album covers.
    See Also:
    Spotify API reference

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Spotify.InstanceHolder
      Helper class to ensure thread-safe singleton creation.
      static class  Spotify.QueryType
      Available query types.

      A dictionary with cached urls to minimize number of request to the actual server.

      Expiration date of the cached token.

      Base URL for the Spotify API.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static Spotify get()
        Returns the singleton.
        Returns:
        the singleton instance.

      • getCover

        public void getCover(String query,
                     Consumer<String> action)
        Gets the URL of the album cover, which matches given query. Uses the cache if the identical request was made in the pas.
        Parameters:
        query - search query.
        action - functor which determines what should happen with received cover art URL.

      • getArtistImage

        public void getArtistImage(String query,
                           Consumer<String> action)
        Gets the URL of the artist icon, which matches given query. Uses the cache if the identical request was made in the pas.
        Parameters:
        query - search query.
        action - functor which determines what should happen with received artist icon URL.

      • getImage

        public void getImage(String query,
                     Spotify.QueryType type,
                     Consumer<Map<Size,String>> action)
        Gets the URL of the requested image, which matches given query.
        Parameters:
        query - search query.
        type - type of the search request.
        action - functor which determines what should happen with received image URL.

      • parseSearch

        private Map<Size,String> parseSearch(JsonReader reader)
        Parses search result.
        Parameters:
        reader - JSON reader.
        Returns:
        a dictionary of images and their sizes.
        See Also:
        API reference

      • parseImage

        private Pair<Size,String> parseImage(JsonReader reader)
        Parses single image.
        Parameters:
        reader - JSON reader.
        Returns:
        a pair consisting of size of the image and the URL to this image.
        See Also:
        API reference

      • cacheQuery

        private String cacheQuery(String query,
                          Map<Size,String> result)
        Caches the query with its result to minimize the number of outgoing requests.
        Parameters:
        query - search query.
        result - search result.
        Returns:
        most relevant search result.

      • getToken

        private void getToken()
        Gets the authorization token.
        See Also:
        API reference

      • connect

        protected InputStream connect(String req)
        Connects to the server using the authorization token. If token was never acquired or expired then this function also gets the token. It does so in thread-safe manner.
        Specified by:
        connect in class Service
        Parameters:
        req - the URL to connect to.
        Returns:
        input stream or null if response code was other than HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK.
